title: lost lp for winning?
body: So I go into my ranked game and my computer crashes at around the 1:20 mark and my computer is rather slow so I didnt get back into the game until around the 10 min mark and when i got into game I was not toxic to anyone whatsoever and I even got a kill I helped the team and even had a decent score but when the game was over and we had won it says I lost lp and was given a 5 game low priority q I made a ticket to riot but I fear they will not help can a rioter comment on this and they are more than welcome to look into the game themselves I just feel like I played that game for no reason and tried to win for no reason since I lost lp and was given a punishment for doing so.

replies.body: The reason you lost your LP, is because you still got logged as AFK by the "Leaver Buster System". Once your logged by it, i am close to sertain that you will not gain any LP for the game, even if you manage to win. I hope you found this usefull!
But shouldn't this be considered a mistake seeing as it was automated like why join back even if im not going to get the lp for trying hard to come back from that deficit

The reason you lost LP, despite your team pushing through without you being in the entire game, is because you were out of the match long enough to be reasonably marked as AFK. Those 8 minutes could have had a lasting effect on the outcome of the match, so it will count that match as a loss for you since you weren't there the entire game.

I understand this but it was right at the start of the game and you are free to watch the replay of the match and read the chat logs for yourself I came back as soon as I could and helped them win. :/ like if my computer crashes again I just feel like I wont join back since i'll just get a loss of lp and a punishment regardless

I understand this but it was right at the start of the game and you are free to watch the replay of the match and read the chat logs for yourself I came back as soon as I could and helped them win. :/
Ideally I would like my 16 lp back plus the 21 I would have gotten for winning the game.
